channel.title: My friend got on a pornsite
channel.description: Well, my friend got on a pron site, and it changed his homepage...well, when he went to change it back, all the stuff to change it isnt there...its like un-clickable...any idea how to fix it?

item.title: My friend got on a pornsite
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

poopy4231:

Yeah… firefox are all for my important links… I just use IE for porn…

thats actually much worse, porn sites are usually the ones who do damage to your computer, you should use firefox

Read full topic

item.title: My friend got on a pornsite
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:5, topic:5848”][quote author=Evil_ link=topic=7829.msg83111#msg83111 date=1153637776]

Well, my friend got on a pron site, and it changed his homepage…well, when he went to change it back, all the stuff to change it isnt there…its like un-clickable…any idea how to fix it?

www.getfirefox.com

download and install firefox, problem fixed

tell your “friend” I said hi

lmbo i swear its a friend, i use firefox imo it pwns IE lol
[/quote]

sure it was a friend ;)[/quote]lol, i admit it, i do look at porn(what guy doesn’t?) but i do it with IE and delete history haha…but this truly was a friend it happened to

item.title: My friend got on a pornsite
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Get HiJackThis

Save it in your C:\ drive else it will not run correctly.

Run HiJackThis, and you will probably come up with a bunch of stuff. Find something that starts with R0, and then there should be a couple things on Internet Explorers HomePage. Check them, and fix them. Reboot your computer and you should be fine.

Or what Mopar said… I was a little late.

Read full topic
